title: Consuming passions
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Gas - Heating and cooking

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery (Natural foods)
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Gas - Heating and cooking
description: As shown on ABC TV, Ian Parmenter shows how quick and easy it is to prepare dishes, using simple recipes and good ingredients. Ian's methods are elementary, requiring few skills and employing basic kitchen implements. Food preparation techniques are explained and advice provided. The recipes include bread, honey prawns, mayonnaise, pasta, rice dishes, stir fry and various sweet dishes. Produced with the assistance of the National Heart Foundation.
